roleset.name: Shape by forcing through a die, press or thrust out with another

example.name: All args, probably only example we'll ever see!
example.text: Automated machines coextrude long plastic sheaths with graphite - plastic cores that are printed , cut , painted and eraser - fitted .
example.arg: long plastic sheaths with graphite - plastic cores that are printed , cut , painted and eraser - fitted .

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire.
